::Jhiaxus/Zarak::
   
  Zarak makes sure the doors are secure so nightlight would have no chance to escape.
   
  Jhiaxus looks at the Maximal femmebot prisoner that was so dear to the Transformer Jhiaxus hated more then even Galvatron: Rodimus Prime.
   
  Jhiaxus: Yes, it was me all along. A pleasure to see you again. It was so easy to fool and capture you. I'm shocked that such a legendary figure in our history such as Rodimus Prime would ever fall for such a weak, stupid and pathetic femmebot.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Hydras/Perceptor:

"Peceptor" hissed Hydras

Perceptor whose know what Hydras whant went to wards the unconceus 
femme and with one of his device jammed Nightlight commlink, just in 
time 'cause the femme was starting to awake.

"It seems that the sleepy beaty is awakening"hissed Hydras "Long time 
without pay a visit, Nighlight, no since you was reprogramed as 
predacon with the name "Blackstorm"... Dont let her run away!!!"

Nightlight tried to understood what had happened while she was sat 
down in the floor, first she saw the puppet, the helmet and then to 
Jhiaxus

"YOU!"Said shocked the femme"It was you!"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:

> ::Jhiaxus-Hevn/Scorponok-Zarak::
> 
> The Hevn puppet lands outside the base of Hydras' Predacons.
> 
> Apon arriving Scorponok opens the main doors and allows the 
puppet to come to the room with Hydras, Scorponok and Jhiaxus 
controlling Hevn.
> 
> The puppet deactivates the cloaking device and signal masker. The 
puppet drops the uncouncious Nightlight on the ground.
> 
> Jhiaxus takes off the control helmet and allows it to drop to the 
ground. He looks to Hydras with a smile.
> 
> Jhiaxus: Mission complete.
> 
> Scorponok transforms to scorpion mode in a restful position as 
Zarak detaches and changes to his humanoid form, removing the helmet 
to his exo-suit.
> 
> Zarak: That went smoothly. I'm surprised but pleased.
> 
>
